title: Forecast Point
description: A single point on a budget-to-outcome curve. Points should be ordered by ascending budget to form a curve showing how delivery metrics scale with spend.

budget.description: Budget amount for this forecast point

reach.description: Estimated unique reach at this budget level

impressions.description: Estimated impressions at this budget level

clicks.description: Estimated clicks at this budget level

views.description: Estimated views at threshold at this budget level (for CPV)

conversions.description: Estimated conversions at this budget level

leads.description: Estimated leads at this budget level

grps.description: Estimated Gross Rating Points at this budget level (for CPP)
